H0.text: Which was the only team that England did not beat in their qualifying campaign for the 2014 Soccer World Cup . Poland

H3.text: Which was the only team that England did not beat in their qualifying campaign for the 2014 Soccer World Cup . UKR

A4.text: On 17 October, Poland drew 1–1 with England, with Glik scoring the equalizing goal.

A5.text: On 7 September, Poland's first qualifying match ended in a 2–2 swung with Montenegro.
